projectDescription: A cross-chain messaging protocol used to move data and assets between blockchains.

sharedCategories.name: basics
sharedCategories.contextDescription: The following section contains foundational documentation shared across all {PROJECT_NAME} products. It describes the architecture and messaging infrastructure that serve as the backbone for all integrations built with {PROJECT_NAME}.
